name: Regala2
description:
Regala2 is a fun chaotic co-op game for two players where you have to communicate effectively in order to succeed! 

It's Christmas Eve and you,  as elves, have to finish the remaining gifts before Santa leaves! Finish up as many gifts as possible within the time limit, and compete with your friends!

Enjoy!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Regala2 es un divertido y caotico juego cooperativo para dos jugadores, donde deben comunicarse efectivamente para triunfar!

Es Noche Buena y ustedes, como elfos, deben terminar de armar los regalos restantes antes de que Santa se vaya a entregarlos! Finalicen la mayor cantidad de regalos posibles en el tiempo límite, y compitan con sus amigos !

Mucha suerte!
